items.sentence: I think that Tom and Mary may be able to do that if you help them.
I wanted my parents to be at my wedding, but they refused to come.
Tom and Mary will be leaving for Australia early tomorrow morning.
Tom got into a fight with Mary\'s brother and got his nose broken.
Tom hopes he doesn\'t have to live in Boston for more than a year.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever asked Mary why she got fired.
I asked Tom if he knew anybody who could teach my children French.
I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me Mary didn\'t have to do that.
I don\'t know when, but it\'s likely to happen before next Monday.
Tom used to eat out almost every day, but now he can\'t afford to.
